channel.title: DestinyScape HUGE Project, Need developers!
channel.description:
[CENTER]OK, some of you may have seen my previous thread about DestinyScapes 525
Well, I as Owner, and the Co-Owner and all of the Developers, have decided we want to go HUGE! We have decided we are developing the following: DestinyScape 317 DestinyScape 508 DestinyScape 525
[u]These are the job positions:[/u]
[U]DestinyScape 317:[/U] Server Developers:[code] Donate [/code] [COLOR=blue]Client Developers:[/COLOR] [code] None [/code] [U]DestinyScape 508:[/U] [COLOR=limegreen]Server Developers:[/COLOR] [code] Me Poop [/code] [COLOR=blue]Client Developers:[/COLOR] [code] None Need 1/2 more [/code] [COLOR=green]Admins:[/COLOR][code] Me This position will be decided on activity on forums and game. And will not be applied for. [/code] [COLOR=teal]Mods:[/COLOR] [code] None. You may apply for this position, but will need to be active on forums/game. [/code][navy]Hoster:[/COLOR] [code] We have one, but if your specs are better than the last then you will host. [/code]
[COLOR=orange][U]DestinyScape 525:[/U][/COLOR] [COLOR=limegreen]Server Developers:[/COLOR] [code] Me Need 1/2 more [/code] [COLOR=Blue]Client Developers:[/COLOR][code] None Need 1/2 more [/code] [COLOR=Green]Admins:[/COLOR] [code] Me This position will be decided on activity on forums and game. And will not be applied for. [/code] [COLOR=teal]Mods:[/COLOR] [code] None. You may apply for this position, but will need to be active on forums/game. [/code] [COLOR=navy]Hoster:[/COLOR] [code] We have one, but if your specs are better than the last then you will host. [/code]
[COLOR=orange][U]Website/Forums[/U][/COLOR] [COLOR=maroon]Graphics Designers:[/COLOR] [code] WizOfTheOne: Support Siggy and Logo Mr. Klean: Some Ranks Rick: Some Ranks If you are amazing at Graphics post please! [/code] [COLOR=Purple]Categories sort out:[/COLOR][code] None Need 1 [/code] [COLOR=Green]Admin:[/COLOR] [code] Me Quickmarch [/code] [COLOR=teal]Mod:[/COLOR][code] None, apply for position [/code]
[COLOR=Brown]Application Form:[/COLOR] Copy and paste this: [code] What position are you applying for?: What server or forums?: Why do you think you deserve this position?: Will you be helpful?: Will you be active?: Have you had any experience in this area?: [/code]
The Website/Forums, are hopefully being put up today! And we want EVERYONE to register! I will put a notice up on here when they are up We have vBulletin. We have our own domain: DestinyScape.com
If we get enough active players we will definately move to a VPS. ATM, we have 24/7 hosting setup for each server. [/CENTER]
T~M

item.title: DestinyScape HUGE Project, Need developers!
item.dc:creator: @rumboy8 rumboy8
item.description:
@rumboy8 wrote:

Yes, we have great coders for the 317 and 508, I am currently editing the 525, but still looking for a 525 coder.

T~M[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 04, 2009, 08:50:49 am[/size][hr]Anyone who wants to help, please help us by going to
http://widget.chipin.com/widget/id/51dac4bc5bd96a63
And donate as much as possible.
We need this money for hosting.

Please
T~M[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 05, 2009, 11:57:54 am[/size][hr]WE GOT FORUMS UP!
Register now at:
destinyscape.com/forum

~Destiny~

Read full topic

I have edited loads of the 525.
What have you made?

T~M[/quote]

I don’t think he has any work
Never seen it if he does though.

GL on this, but some proof (pictures) of development would be nice. Like, how far you are so far, etc…

item.title: DestinyScape HUGE Project, Need developers!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

You can post the project, just not a development team.

If you want a development team, you have to PM a mod/Admin to give you permission, and post the proof on the thread.

Well, I as Owner, and the Co-Owner and all of the Developers, have decided we want to go HUGE!
